name: Mushroom Dance
description:
For the upcoming moon festival the little mushroom Roo makes their way through the forest to gather magic moon water. Help them overcome all obstacles in their little adventure.

Big Shoutout to sixtisix, Loki+LPunicorn, DrTronik, Deliciouzlp, Chaxs and Yashi for putting up with me and getting me though this project.  I would not have made it without you and also thank you for lending me your characters for the ending <3 

Please  check their games out they did an amazing job!

Sound Credits:

Titlescreen/Intro: Daybreak by Eardeer

Level: Night Forest by Lasdimot and Snowfall by ShadyDave
